About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

My name is Iskren Ivanov, I`m currently located in Sofia, Bulgaria.

I study Web Design/Web Development in Software University in Sofia, and Udemy online Academy.

For the passed 8 years, I`ve worked in various sectors of industries abroad and in country.

My involvement into programming and development came in the early 2010, when I graduated school in 2010 with a IT Technologies and Telecommunications degree, and begun to explore different web and desktop applications.

My goal is to develop my range of skills and knowledge and continue work and study as I go. I`ve worked as well as under intense pressure and calm environment`s, so the job intensity is no bother to me.

My side interests are in PHOTOGRAPHY, digital art and design, animations and digital 3D art.

My music of choice depends on my mood. I like to listen to music while I work, I think It helps me concentrate and keeps me focused.
